description:
Bolstered by a momentous ICJ ruling, Palestinians, including Americans, gave three hours of testimony against the Biden administration.

The post “I Have Lost Everything”: In Federal Court, Palestinians Accuse Biden of Complicity in Genocide appeared first on The Intercept.
title: “I Have Lost Everything”: In Federal Court, Palestinians Accuse Biden of Complicity in Genocide

description:

title: Dear Biden Apologists: Reproductive Justice Means Fighting for Gaza’s Women and Children

description:
“I’m not aware of any U.S. forces on the ground,” a Pentagon spokesperson said, directly contradicting the White House.

The post Pentagon Suggests There’re No U.S. Troops in Yemen — but Last Month the White House Said There Are appeared first on The Intercept.
title: Pentagon Suggests There’re No U.S. Troops in Yemen — but Last Month the White House Said There Are

description:

description:
While the 17-judge panel ordered Israel to halt any genocidal acts in Gaza, it stopped short of ordering immediate ceasefire.

title: ICJ Ruling on Gaza Genocide Is a Historic Victory for the Palestinians That Israel Vows to Defy

description:
Pakistan’s ambassador to the United Nations, Munir Akram, discusses developments in Pakistan and the broader regime at a time of crisis.

title: Pakistan Ambassador Opens Up
